title: RPG Maker VX 1.02 (Fixed)
description:
1. Install the RTP
2. Install RPG Maker VX 1.02
3. Run &#039;Patch.exe&#039; from the Crack directory and select the main RPGVX executable file
4. Enjoy!


Note:
This is an inline patch which uses an external dll, therefore a file called Homer.dll will be copied to the 
RPG Maker VX directory when you apply the patch. The file is not harmful in any way, and it&#039;s sole purpose is to
do an offset patch on the unpacked RPGVX.exe while in memory.
I have included the source code in case anyone is interested.
